description: Application for a non-material amendment to condition 4 on permission 21/01641/FULM to revise the wording of the condition.  The parent permission being an application for a minor material amendment to amend Condition 2 to revise the mix and total number of units, make minor external and massing alterations, the addition of solar panels and automatic opening smoke vents to the roof, vary the quantum of commercial (Gym use) floorspace, revise the landscaping strategy, revise the energy strategy and revise the drainage strategy to parent permission 19/01828/FULM (as amended by 19/01828/FULMMIN02). The parent permission for this being for the demolition of the existing building and redevelopment to provide a part five, part four-storey building with Use Class D2 at ground floor level, undercroft parking, refuse/recycling and cycle store and residential dwellings on the upper floors.
